# Github Copilot App Modernization Docs

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/github-copilot-app-modernization/overview.md): Learn more about GitHub Copilot app modernization. This Visual Studio extension helps you upgrade your code and projects. Upgrades can include .NET versioning or migrating code from one technology to another.

## Upgrade .NET apps

- [How to upgrade with GitHub Copilot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/github-copilot-app-modernization/how-to-upgrade-with-github-copilot.md): Learn how to upgrade your .NET applications to newer versions using GitHub Copilot app modernization in Visual Studio. This step-by-step guide covers the three-stage workflow: assessment, planning, and execution.
- [How to apply custom upgrade instructions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/github-copilot-app-modernization/how-to-custom-upgrade-instructions.md): Create and apply custom upgrade instructions with GitHub Copilot to automate .NET upgrades. Learn to write, test, and integrate instructions for consistent transformations.
